title: IREDA incorporates subsidiary in GIFT City, Gujarat
description: Pradip Kumar Das, Chairman & Managing Director of IREDA, said, "This subsidiary not only positions IREDA to extend its global reach but also acts as an offshore platform for securing competitive funding to drive the renewable energy sector's growth." He added that IREDA's entry into the IFSC is anticipated to unlock fresh business prospects and establish its global footprint in the renewable energy sector.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
